<p>There are a few undeniable truths in this world: the sky is blue, Mario Kart is always a good idea and <a data-i13n="cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/audio/headphones/heres-how-the-sony-wh-1000xm6-compare-to-the-wh-1000xm5-and-airpods-max-193706730.html">Sony's 1000X line of headphones</a> is amazing. The latter was proved true once again when Sony released the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0F3PT1VBL&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=119697cd-8ad3-4caf-88b7-07978581cd6f&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=WH-1000XM6+edition&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAUSZFmTk8IxcHShLKz7CxUWUOnULo_enXO8PrvEuyk4G&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FSony-WH-1000XM6-Headphones-Microphones-Studio-Quality%2Fdp%2FB0F3PT1VBL%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Sony-WH-1000XM6-Headphones-Microphones-Studio-Quality/dp/B0F3PT1VBL/?th=1">WH-1000XM6 edition</a> of its wireless noise canceling headphones in May. The only downside is its price, coming in at $450 — $50 more than its predecessors launch price.</p> 
<p>Amazon is throwing all of us a bone, though, and having a sale of sorts. Right now, you can get the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0F939YVHH&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=119697cd-8ad3-4caf-88b7-07978581cd6f&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Sony+WH-1000XM6+headphones+and+a+%2430+Amazon+gift+card&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAQI4KwIhl6Z0As4XTNC5eB4RvN0JtTvletiCCQhptW7j&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FSony-WH-1000XM6-Canceling-Headphones-Midnight%2Fdp%2FB0F939YVHH" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Sony-WH-1000XM6-Canceling-Headphones-Midnight/dp/B0F939YVHH?th=1">Sony WH-1000XM6 headphones and a $30 Amazon gift card</a> for $448. Yes, that is $2 less than the headphones on their own. It's no secret that the "bundle" serves as a nice incentive to buy Sony's new headphones from Amazon, but, hey, a $30 gift card never hurt anyone.</p> <span id="end-legacy-contents"></span>
<p>
 <core-commerce id="d8a4951dc604404dbfb68a1e2ae618b5" data-type="product-list" data-original-url="https://www.amazon.com/Sony-WH-1000XM6-Canceling-Headphones-Midnight/dp/B0F939YVHH?th=1"></core-commerce></p> 
<p>Sony released the WH-1000XM6 headphones three years after their predecessor, but the new model quickly proved to be worth the wait. We gave the M6s a <a data-i13n="cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/audio/headphones/sony-wh-1000xm6-review-the-best-headphones-just-keep-on-getting-better-160058170.html">94 in our review</a> thanks to features like improved sound and better active noise cancelation. One of the best things about this model compared to the M5s is the return to a folding design — I love my <a data-i13n="cpos:5;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/sonys-wh-1000xm5-anc-headphones-fall-back-to-328-in-early-black-friday-deal-100508200.html">M5s</a> but it's very annoying that they don't shrink at all. The M6s are also very comfy and have a wider headband for easy wear.&nbsp;</p>This article originally appeared on Engadget at https://www.engadget.com/deals/this-amazon-bundle-includes-the-sony-wh-1000xm6-headphones-and-a-free-30-gift-card-144511508.html?src=rss
